Posts.Content: From what I understand (I got one 2 weeks ago), is that once your results are in from the LEEP you have to go in 2 weeks after the LEEP to see how you are feeling and healing...and then 6 weeks later to see how you healed. Then, you go every 3 months for a year..and once you get 3 normal paps in a row, you go every 6 months (same thing...) and then finally once a year again. I know this sounds confusing, but I hope it helped out Did you have a LEEP?
Posts.Title: Next Step
